xTransfer(address,uint256,address,uint32.details: User should approve a spending allowance before calling this.

params.slippage: The maximum amount of slippage the user will accept in BPS.
params.token: Address of the token on this domain.

params.destinationUnwrapper: Address of the Unwrapper contract on destination.
params.slippage: The maximum amount of slippage the user will accept in BPS.
params.weth: Address of the WETH contract on this domain.

xTransfer(address,uint256,address,uint32.notice: Transfers non-native assets from one chain to another.

xTransferEth(address,address,uint256,add.notice: Transfers native assets from one chain to another.
